# `codeswitchR`: Code switching in R

This `README` is an attempt to collate a list of packages that may be helpful
for teaching people how to switch between a coding language or ecosystem they
know and the one they wish to learn.

data wrangling + analysis | `dplyr` | `SQL` | `dbplyr` | `r knitr::include_graphics("examples/dplyr_sql.jpeg")`
data wrangling + analysis | `SQL` | `dplyr` | `tidyquery` | `r knitr::include_graphics("examples/sql_dplyr.jpeg")`
writing equations | `LaTeX` | `plotmath` | `latex2exp` | `r knitr::include_graphics("examples/latex_plotmath.jpeg")`
writing equations | `plotmath` | `LaTeX` | `simsalapar` | `r knitr::include_graphics("examples/plotmath_latex.jpeg")`
writing reports | `markdown` | `LaTeX`, `HTML` | `commonmark` | `r knitr::include_graphics("examples/markdown_many.jpeg")`
